channel.title: MaxClickEmpire Feed
channel.description: Latest digital guides, tools, and growth hacks from MaxClickEmpire.

item.title: How to Create an ATS-Friendly Resume on Google Docs
item.description: Learn how to create a 100% ATS-friendly resume using Google Docs. Step-by-step tips, formatting guidelines, and free templates to help your resume pass the ATS scan and land interviews.

item.title: Best Free Google Docs Resume Templates
item.description: Discover the best free Google Docs resume templates to land your dream job. Browse modern, professional, and ATS-friendly designs you can edit instantly in Google Docs.
